column4: Uncategorized;Phnom Penh: A entertainment and gambling complex “1618 Bobbiya”
column6: Toul Kork was visited by police and Royal Gendarmerie on November 29th.------One of the unidentified sources said that the arcade
column8: did not have proper permissions to operate casino style games (fruit machines
column9: fish game tables etc.).------Nobody was arrested after the visit
column10: and journalists were kept away and given very little information.------After a friendly chat with the owners
column11: it is still unsure whether the location will remain open
column12: or if the offending games will be removed.------https://tvfb.news/article/16391------
